sentences.english: This weekend I'm going to install a home security system.

sentences.english: The security guard of the apartment did not enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy.

sentences.english: Under such a disadvantage, Chang An was hit by a security high voltage electric shock device.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的劣勢下，常安被保安的高壓電擊器擊中。

sentences.english: I am due for a talking-to after my little bout with the drug store police this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今早跟藥店保安周旋之後，你肯定要找我談話。

sentences.english: In this story, Tom was easy to kill two of Chinese innocent safeguard.

sentences.chinese: 雙揹帶扣封，確保安全的契合。

sentences.english: It was the gloomy star of the police which was rising in the sewer.
sentences.chinese: 這是保安警察的陰暗的星光在陰渠中升起了。

sentences.english: Security forces were ordered out to control the situation in the city.

sentences.english: The guard's mouth is like a knife.

sentences.english: Many of these people are guards who must sleep outside.
sentences.chinese: 其中很多人是保安人員，必須睡在外面。

sentences.english: This machine should be earthed correct to ensure safety.
sentences.chinese: 本機必須正確接地，確保安全。
